contest-event.event-date:
June 18, 2017 D Morley March & Hymn Tune Contest
Morley March & Hymn Tune Contest 0 March & Hymn Contest
morley-march-hymn-tune-contest
Queen Street, Morley, Leeds, West Yorkshire, England, UK Start time: 12:30pm
Points: March placing + hymn placing = total In the event of a tie, the higher placing in the street march takes precedence
Best street march: Fishburn Best deportment: Fishburn Best first section band: Skelmanthorpe Prospect Brass Best second section band: Kippax Best third section band: no entries Best fourth section band: Elmfield Brass (Stockport) Best youth band: Shirland Welfare Training Best contest march: Marsden Silver Prize Best hymn tune: Marsden Silver Prize Best instrumentalist: euphonium, Marsden Silver Prize Best youth hymn tune: Shirland Welfare Training Best youth deportment: Tewit Youth Intermediate
March 31, 2017, 11:41 a.m. June 25, 2017, 10:41 a.m.
